meanings.sent1: The candidate gave a gubernatorial speech at the rally.
meanings.sent2: The state held a gubernatorial election last month.
meanings.sent3: The gubernatorial mansion had a grand staircase.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership style was truly gubernatorial in nature.
meanings.sent5: The flag outside the building symbolized gubernatorial authority.

meanings.definition: of or relating to the office of a governor
meanings.sent1: The official ceremony highlighted gubernatorial duties.
meanings.sent2: The staff organized a gubernatorial meeting for the governor.
meanings.sent3: The gubernatorial desk was always cluttered with papers.
meanings.sent4: His attire reflected the seriousness of his gubernatorial role.
meanings.sent5: The seal on the document signified its gubernatorial importance.

meanings.sent1: Her confident demeanor was truly gubernatorial.
meanings.sent2: The governor's speech had a gubernatorial tone.
meanings.sent3: The cake at the party was decorated with a gubernatorial theme.
meanings.sent4: His decision-making process was undeniably gubernatorial.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the essence of gubernatorial power.
